listItems.title: Product Management
listItems.details: Translating the client’s vision to technical requirements. Coordinating between the client and the development team to prioritize scope changes and bug fixes based on business objectives.

listItems.title: Account Management
listItems.details: Nurturing client relationships. Getting sign-off on proposed work and incorporating client feedback throughout production.

listItems.title: Business Development
listItems.details: Acquiring new clients through a detailed understanding of their requirements and industry. Writing proposals / RFP responses with clear product vision.

listItems.title: Content Production
listItems.details: Writing all Code + Mortar marketing content, including copy for the agency’s new website. Copywriting for clients who require new online content.

items.intro: Hired initially as a summer intern and asked to stay on as a part-time employee while in school. User and product research, data analysis and wireframing, UX design and analysis.
Assistance with user and product research, wireframing and information architecture.
